Name: Rana
Title: Gem of Remembrance: Rana
Desc: "We still have a lot of time with each other. We can explore the vastness of the forest, the world, and the future together."

Talent.Name: Rana
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After your character uses an Elemental Skill:</color> Create 1 Elemental Die of the same Type as your next off-field character. (Once per Round)
